rows.label: tev000411_MSG0010
rows.name:
If you and the hero Alois Bernholt are
taking to the field, then I should be right
there with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0020
rows.name:
If I'm to reach the heights I was destined
for, I'll have to watch him closely and pick
up all that I can. You don't mind, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hm. As it should be.
...Oh, don't worry. I'll do my job.
Flawlessly, I might add.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0080
rows.name:
Gah... You're determined to thwart me,
aren't you? Well, I won't give up, or my
name isn't Hector Birtwhistle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0081
rows.name: Final dungeon meetup event (when not in party)

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0090
rows.name: Well, well. Look who decided to finally show up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0100
rows.name:
In the time it took you to get here,
I analyzed all enemy data we've collected
to date. Twice. As any elite should.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000411_MSG0110
rows.name:
Well? We're done here, aren't we?
Isn't it time we moved on?[ST:wait ]
